title: WTF are they doing to ChOP'Gath?
body:
_"Vorpal Spikes (E)  [reworked]
"Mana Cost: 30 at all ranks
Cooldown: 8/7/6/5/4  
Cho'gath's next 3 basic attacks launch spikes that deal 20/35/50/65/80 (+30% AP) plus X% (4% + 0.5% per Feast stack) of enemies' maximum health as magic damage and apply a 30/35/40/45/50% slow, decaying over the next 1.5 seconds.""_

What??
